name: ChanceEnyer's Artemis Fowl
description:
Monday May 13 2019 Update Notes:

- Added chapter two

- Fixed a bug that caused Artemis to rapidly multiply and crash the game

- Fixed the Floating butler Bug

- Implemented the first minigame

- Updated placeholder artworks

- Edited the UI to be easier to read (Player request)

- Added more tracks to the game

- Fixed my Artemis sound file issues

-----------

What happens next/is being worked on

- Post chapter animation cutscenes (still debating if they fit well)

- Chapter Three , and all that comes with it oh lord why do i do this to myself

- Fixing Bugs (please let me know if you see them! Mulch is very hungry and he loves a snack!)

- Mainscreen Artemis's eyes are incomplete, still figuring out the passwords/rewards system
